title: Spatial calibration and uncertainty reduction of the SWAT model using multiple remotely sensed data
content:

Author(s): Sangchul Lee, Dongho Kim, Gregory W. McCarty, Martha Anderson, Feng Gao, Fangni Lei, Glenn E. Moglen, Xuesong Zhang, Haw Yen, Junyu Qi, Wade Crow, In-Young Yeo, Liang Sun
